Find your Local Sporting Club Today

Get Involved On and Off the Field

Dream of umpiring your local cricket match? Passionate about encouraging aspiring athletes and envision yourself in the coach's seat?

Or perhaps you and your family want to join a club for the many benefits of health and fitness?

Whether you’re interested in participating, volunteering, coaching, or officiating, there’s a place for you in your local sporting community.

Discover how you can make a difference today and find your community sports clubs today by accessing the Australian Sports Commission Get Involved platform:

We acknowledge and respect the traditional lands and cultures of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nation, the Traditional Owners and Custodians of the Country on which Pacific Epping resides, and pay our respects to Elders past and present. We recognise First Nations peoples’ longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
